Review Text: Great production with fantastic actors and acting. Love the locations and scenery. Plots are well executed. Character studies are well executed and add to the plot's intrigue. Love how everything all weaves together in the end.
Review Title: Great Mystery Series

Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Charles Palmer', 'Hettie Macdonald', 'Metin Hüseyin', 'Nicholas Renton'], 'Producers': ['Chris Burt', 'Damien Timmer', 'Michele Buck', 'Rebecca Eaton'], 'Starring': ['Clare Holman', 'Kevin Whatley', 'Laurence Fox'], 'Studio': ['PBS']}
Review Text: I love the Inspector Lewis series and can't get enough of it. It is so well directed and written. The acting is superb, and I love the locale. The way the plot is interwoven with all of the character studies always keeps me guessing who dunnit. Can't wait to see each time how the relationship between Lewis and Laura evolves. Overall, it is just a great entertaining series for mystery buffs.
Review Title: Fantastic Series!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/03/09
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Kelly', "David O'Neill", 'Nicholas Renton', 'Tim Fywell'], 'Producers': ['Chris Burt', 'Damien Timmer', 'Michele Buck', 'Rebecca Eaton'], 'Starring': ['Clare Holman', 'Kevin Whately', 'Laurence Fox']}
Review Text: Another great season of mystery and mayhem. Great directing, acting and writing on this show. Love the scenery and characterizations. Love seeing Lewis and Dr. Hobson taking their relationship to the next level, even though it is slow and steady. I hate it when each season ends. I can't get enough of this series.
Review Title: Great Series
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2014/03/09
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Kelly', 'Daniel Reed', 'Tim Fywell'], 'Producers': ['Chris Burt', 'Damien Timmer', 'Michele Buck', 'Rebecca Eaton'], 'Starring': ['Charlie Cox', 'Clare Holman', 'Kevin Whately'], 'Studio': ['PBS']}
Review Text: Finally! Lewis and Laura are a couple. It was a long time coming, but worth the suspense. This is the last season on my watchlist, but I hope it isn't the end of the series. Will Hathaway really resign? Will Lewis really retire? Too many questions are left unanswered. There has to be more seasons of this great series. I am too hooked for it to be the end. Masterpiece Theater has some of the best shows on TV. I will keep watching in hopes of seeing all my favorites again.
Review Title: Fantastic Series!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: Don't know how I missed this series, but so glad I discovered it. Loved Silence of the Lambs and The Red Dragon, so this show has definitely got my interest. Couldn't stop watching it once I started. Pulled an all-nighter to finish the first season. Fantastic actors, writers, directors and producers make this a fantastic show. Loved all of the epicurean creations by Hannibal. Really added something to the show. The struggle between good and evil is a very interesting one to watch evolve.
Review Title: Emotional Roller Coaster Ride of a show!

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user demonstrates a strong affinity for high-quality storytelling, exceptional direction, and stellar performances across multiple series. They appreciate well-executed plots, character developments, and engaging settings that enhance the viewing experience. Frequent mentions of outstanding acting and well-crafted storylines highlight their enjoyment, particularly in mystery genres where character relationships and plots interweave seamlessly. The user exhibits enthusiasm for series that keep them guessing, expressing excitement about character arcs and intricate narratives. Overall, the user's purchase history reflects a passion for captivating and emotionally engaging series that consistently deliver quality entertainment.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has encountered some disappointment with a couple of productions, indicating that certain viewing experiences did not meet their expectations. They noted specific issues such as unclear storylines and a lack of available subtitles, which diminished their enjoyment of some films. A lower average rating for certain products suggests dissatisfaction with the execution and overall coherence. The user expressed a desire for more clarity and resolution in plots, indicating frustration with unresolved character arcs or storylines that left them wanting more. These negative experiences reveal a preference for films that maintain clarity and cohesion throughout their narratives.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's purchase history highlights a clear preference for engaging, well-directed series that feature strong character development and compelling plots, particularly in the mystery genre. Their positive experiences consistently emphasize a love for exceptional storytelling and stellar performances, showcasing an appreciation for quality in television. However, some negative experiences with clarity and coherence indicate areas for potential improvement. Overall, the user's engagement with these series reflects a deep appreciation for emotional and intellectual stimulation, while also expressing valid concerns regarding plot clarity in certain productions.

target_interaction.title: Terrific Series!
target_interaction.text: Just when you thought things couldn't get much worse. Love this series. I am a faithful fan. This season kept me on the edge of my seat. Wasn't sure who would make it out alive. We are starting to see some  of the characters unravel from all they've been through, which should be no surprise. Lots of walkers and blood and gore. Still enjoying the great acting, directing and story plot, even after 6 seasons.
